response.original_title: Multiple Chemical Sensitivity and Environmental Illness: Awareness and Acknowledgement
response.overview: Due to her sensitivities to chemicals used in buildings and prevalent in outside environments, Marie LeBlanc is forced to live in her van. To keep from freezing to death in her van during the bitter cold Canadian winters, Marie heads to the Arizona desert to help keep warm and avoid environmental triggers. On her way, she meets others with similar conditions who, like Marie, have a hard time securing adequate medical help, housing and access to disability benefits.
response.title: Multiple Chemical Sensitivity and Environmental Illness: Awareness and Acknowledgement
